name: AstroMaster Beta
description:
AstroMaster Beta

Ranging  different kinds of puzzles to solve comes along with an terrific rewards that enables you to upgrade your character from dull to godly armour and weapon set!

Adventure  Sci-Fi  Puzzle

Controls

L Stick - Move 

R Stick - Aim Grapple

R Bumper - Fire Grapple

A - Jump / Select

B- Crouch/ Back

D-Pad - Move Up/Down Grapple / Navigate Menus

The Devs

Aaron Sait - Programmer 

Marc De Ocampo - Artist

Yanko Savov  Savov - Artist

Cai Burrows - Artist 

Cameron Duffy - Artist

Installation Instruction

Download Zip file below:

Step1 : download zipfile Step2: Extract content  Step3: Run.exe File
